from highway_env.road.lane import StraightLane
from highway_env.road.road import RoadNetwork

def construct_intersection():
    net = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main orthogonal roads
    axis_1 = [[0, 0], [100, 0]]
    axis_2 = [[0, -50], [0, 50]]
    
    # East-West lanes
    net.add_lane("EW", "right", StraightLane(axis_1, width=3.5, line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED)))
    net.add_lane("EW", "left", StraightLane(axis_1[::-1], width=3.5, line_types=(LineType.STRIPED, LineType.CONTINUOUS)))
    
    # North-South lanes (closed section)
    closed_lane = StraightLane(axis_2, width=3.5, line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.CONTINUOUS))
    closed_lane.isClosed = True
    net.add_lane("NS", "up", closed_lane)
    
    # Closure barriers
    net.add_object(RoadObject(type='barrier', position=[0, 25], heading=0))
    return Road(network=net, np_random=RandomState(seed=1))

from highway_env.road.regulation import RegulatedRoad

def construct_intersection():
    net = RoadNetwork()
    # Main straight lanes (fast type)
    center_line = [0, 0]
    lane_width = 3.5
    main_lane = StraightLane(center_line, [200, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.CONTINUOUS), width=lane_width)
    net.add_lane("north", "south", main_lane)
    
    # Intersection closure simulation
    closure_start = 50
    closure_length = 20
    closure_barrier = RoadObject("closure_barrier", 
                                [closure_start, -lane_width/2], 
                                [closure_start + closure_length, -lane_width/2])
    net.add_object(closure_barrier)
    
    return RegulatedRoad(network=net, 
                        regulatory_elements=["priority_rule", "closure_sign"])

from highway_env.road.lane import StraightLane, CircularLane
from highway_env.road.road import RoadNetwork
from highway_env.vehicle.objects import Obstacle

road_network = RoadNetwork()
intersection_center = [50, 50]

# Crossroad configuration
for angle in [0, np.pi/2, np.pi, 3*np.pi/2]:
    start_pt = intersection_center + utils.rotated_vector([40, 0], angle)
    end_pt = intersection_center + utils.rotated_vector([-40, 0], angle)
    road_network.add_lane(StraightLane(start_pt, end_pt, width=3.5, line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED)))

# Temporary closure barriers
closure_barriers = []
for entry_vector in [[-40,0], [0,40], [40,0], [0,-40]]:
    barrier_pos = intersection_center + entry_vector
    closure_barriers.append(Obstacle(road_network, position=barrier_pos, heading=np.arctan2(entry_vector[1], entry_vector[0])))

def IntersectionGeometry():
    network = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main slow lane (east-west direction)
    slow_lane = StraightLane([0, 0], [200, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED), width=3.5, speed_limit=40)
    
    # Create intersection arms (4-way)
    north = StraightLane([0, 15], [0, 200], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.NONE))
    south = StraightLane([0, -15], [0, -200], line_types=(LineType.NONE, LineType.CONTINUOUS))
    east = StraightLane([15, 0], [200, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.NONE))
    west = StraightLane([-15, 0], [-200, 0], line_types=(LineType.NONE, LineType.CONTINUOUS))
    
    # Add temporary control elements
    network.add_lane("entry", "intersection", slow_lane)
    network.add_lane("north", "intersection", north)
    network.add_lane("south", "intersection", south)
    network.add_lane("east", "intersection", east)
    network.add_lane("west", "intersection", west)
    
    return RegulatedRoad(network, 
                        obstacles=[RoadObject.cone(position=(50, 0))], 
                        stop_lines={slow_lane: 30})

def construct_intersection():
    net = RoadNetwork()
    
    # East-West arterial (special lane type)
    ew_lane = StraightLane([0, 0], [200, 0], line_types=(LineType.STRIPED, LineType.SOLID))
    net.add_lane("east", "int", ew_lane)
    
    # Connecting circular lanes for turns
    radius = 30
    for offset in [-15, 15]:
        turn_lane = CircularLane(
            center=[100, offset],
            radius=radius,
            start_phase=0,
            end_phase=np.pi,
            line_type=LineType.STRIPED
        )
        net.add_lane("int", "north" if offset>0 else "south", turn_lane)
    
    return RegulatedRoad(network=net, np_random=RandomState())

def build_intersection():
    network = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main orthogonal roads
    entry_lane = StraightLane([0, 0], [100, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED), width=4, speed_limit=10)  # Slow lane
    exit_lane = StraightLane([100, 0], [200, 0], line_types=(LineType.STRIPED, LineType.CONTINUOUS), width=4)

from scenic.core.regions import PolylineRegion

def construct_intersection():
    net = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main axes (East-West slow lane)
    east_lane = StraightLane([0, 0], [150, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED), speed_limit=15)
    west_lane = StraightLane([150, 0], [0, 0], line_types=(LineType.STRIPED, LineType.CONTINUOUS), speed_limit=15)
    
    # North-South connecting lanes
    north_approach = CircularLane(center=[75, 50], radius=50, start_phase=0, end_phase=3.14, speed_limit=15)
    south_approach = CircularLane(center=[75, -50], radius=50, start_phase=3.14, end_phase=6.28, speed_limit=15)
    
    net.add_lane("east", "int", east_lane)
    net.add_lane("west", "int", west_lane)
    net.add_lane("north", "int", north_approach)
    net.add_lane("south", "int", south_approach)
    
    # Closure zone
    closure_shape = PolylineRegion([(70, -5), (80, -5), (80, 5), (70, 5)])
    RoadObject(geometry=closure_shape, static=True)
    
    return RegulatedRoad(network=net)

def construct_intersection():
    network = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main orthogonal roads
    entry_lanes = [StraightLane([-150, 0], [-10, 0], line_types=(LineType.STRIPED, LineType.CONTINUOUS), width=4) for _ in range(2)]
    exit_lanes = [StraightLane([10, 0], [150, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED), width=4) for _ in range(2)]
    
    # Circular lanes for turning paths
    turning_radius = 20
    circular_lanes = [
        CircularLane(center=[0, 0], radius=turning_radius, start_phase=0, end_phase=np.pi/2,
        line_type=LineType.CONTINUOUS, width=4) for _ in range(4)
    ]
    
    # Temporary control markers
    control_barrier = RoadObject(object_type="barricade", position=[2, -2], heading=np.pi/4)
    
    network.add_lanes("north", "south", entry_lanes + exit_lanes)
    network.add_lanes("east", "west", circular_lanes)
    network.add_object(control_barrier)
    return network

from highway_env.road.road import RoadNetwork

def construct_intersection():
    net = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main road parameters
    main_lane_width = 3.5
    dash_line = LineType.BROKEN
    solid_line = LineType.CONTINUOUS
    
    # Create 4-way intersection
    for angle in [0, np.pi/2, np.pi, 3*np.pi/2]:
        start = (0, 0)
        end = (50 * np.cos(angle), 50 * np.sin(angle))
        net.add_lane("EW", "E", StraightLane(start, end, line_types=[solid_line, dash_line], width=main_lane_width))
    
    # Temporary control barriers
    barrier_pos = CircularLane(center=[0,0], radius=8, start_phase=np.pi/4, end_phase=3*np.pi/4,
                              width=0.5, line_types=[LineType.STRIPE, LineType.STRIPE])
    net.add_object("barrier", barrier_pos)
    
    return RegulatedRoad(network=net, np_random=np.random)

def IntersectionBuilder():
    network = RoadNetwork()
    
    # Main entrance lanes
    entrance1 = StraightLane([0, -50], [0, -10], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED))
    entrance2 = StraightLane([-50, 0], [-10, 0], line_types=(LineType.CONTINUOUS, LineType.STRIPED))
    
    # Circular arcs for turning paths
    arc1 = CircularLane(center=[0,0], radius=10, start_phase=3*pi/2, end_phase=pi, angle=90)
    arc2 = CircularLane(center=[0,0], radius=10, start_phase=0, end_phase=pi/2, angle=90)
    
    # Closed lane section
    closure_area = BoxObstacle(center=entrance1.position(0.8, 0), length=15, width=3.5)
    closure_area.in_intersection = True
    
    network.add_lane("north", "south", entrance1)
    network.add_lane("west", "east", entrance2)
    network.add_lane("south", "east", arc1)
    network.add_lane("west", "north", arc2)
    
    return RegulatedRoad(network=network, 
                        obstacles=[closure_area],
                        traffic_signals=TrafficSignalState.YELLOW_BLINKING)

                 1: intersection_road.network.get_lane(("east", "west", 1))}

            road=intersection_road,
            lane=lane,
            longitudinal=5 + 20*i,
            speed=base_speed,
            vehicle_type=v_type
        ))
    return vehicles

def EgoBehavior():
    # Maintain straight trajectory
    while True:
        ego.act({"steering": 0, "acceleration": 0})
        if time.time() > 5:  # Trigger brake after 5s
            ego.act({"steering": 0, "acceleration": -6})  # Emergency brake

def AggressiveDriving(vehicle):
    # Tailgating behavior model
    target_speed = vehicle.road.vehicles[0].speed
    vehicle.act({
        "acceleration": 0.2 if vehicle.speed < target_speed else -0.5,
        "steering": 0
    })
    
    # Sudden brake trigger
    if random.random() < 0.05 and time.time() > 2.06:
        vehicle.act({"acceleration": -8})
    yield

behavior tailgating_behavior(Vehicle front_vehicle):
    safety_margin = 0.7
    reaction_time = 0.3
    
    def adjust_gap():
        current_gap = front_vehicle.position.x - self.position.x
        acceleration = (current_gap - safety_margin) / reaction_time
        self.control(self.speed + acceleration * dt)

    every 0.1s:
        adjust_gap()
